divs: Sighting DetailsYES..!I HAVE SEEN THE LIGHT ORBS IN MY BACK YARD SkY AND IN SOME PHOTOS THEY ARE NOT SEEN WITH THE NAKED EYE...! i even found a beamship way out in inerspace and other craft. view the photos let me know what you see...after you blow them up..(O: I was praying because of the ufo experience I've had on the 1-17-11 i heard a voice in my head say we will reviel ourselves to you tommorow 12 o'clock i was late being 1:30 but when i went outside in my yard i looked up at 12:00 and there i saw a bright light orb twinkeling and moving slow 3 or 4 miles an hour it was hovering and moving slow in a long horse shoe form for about ten minutes looked liked a snow ball adgitating and twinkeling i felt releived and calm because i know in my heart that i had prayed for the truth and that they would show up and they did. i can't ay they will show up every time i pray God knows when. I am jut earching for the truth in this matter of fact they do exsist. after blowing the pictures up i found more crafts i have photos and a video that was interferd with while filming and i was not facing the sun.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Highland

Summary: Bright white light orb spotted in my backyard sky...2011
